title: Paramount Plus debuts in the UK, Ireland, and South Korea in June, with more countries to follow in the upcoming months
content:
In the recent years, our digital world has been slowly shifting to the subscription format. Whether it be apps, games, or TV shows — the recurring monthly or annual payments are becoming more prevalent. So now instead of owning the digital goods you’re paying for, you get limited-time access for as long as they’re available

The post Paramount Plus debuts in the UK, Ireland, and South Korea in June, with more countries to follow in the upcoming months appeared first on XDA.
description: Paramount Plus will be debuting in the United Kingdom, Ireland, and South Korea in June. More countries will follow in late 2022 and 2023.
